Uses of Class
tilt.image.page.Word

  • Packages that use Word 
    Package Description
    tilt.handler
    These classes handle the various types of REST request (PUT,DELETE,GET,POST) and also specific services, such as returning images referred to on HTMLpages (TiltImageHandler) and GeoJson (GeoJsonHandler).
    tilt.image.page
    The purpose of this package is to represent the visually identified parts of the page: the lines and word-shapes.

    • Uses of Word in tilt.handler

      Methods in tilt.handler that return Word 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Word[] TextIndex.getWords(float ppc)
      Get the extracted words as an array of objects

    • Uses of Word in tilt.image.page

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Align word shapes in image to words in text
      void Line.setShapeWord(int index, Word word)
      Set the word offset of the indexed shape
